### Steps to reproduce the issue

```
$ spack install gmsh
...

```
while trying to concretize the partial spec:

    scotch
        ^bison@3.7.6%gcc@11.1.0 arch=linux-debian9-skylake_avx512
            ^diffutils@3.7%gcc@11.1.0 arch=linux-debian9-skylake_avx512
                ^libiconv@1.16%gcc@11.1.0 arch=linux-debian9-skylake_avx512
            ^m4@1.4.19%gcc@11.1.0+sigsegv arch=linux-debian9-skylake_avx512
                ^libsigsegv@2.13%gcc@11.1.0 arch=linux-debian9-skylake_avx512
            ^perl@5.34.0%gcc@11.1.0+cpanm+shared+threads arch=linux-debian9-skylake_avx512
                ^berkeley-db@18.1.40%gcc@11.1.0+cxx~docs+stl arch=linux-debian9-skylake_avx512
                ^gdbm@1.19%gcc@11.1.0 arch=linux-debian9-skylake_avx512
                    ^readline@8.1%gcc@11.1.0 arch=linux-debian9-skylake_avx512
                        ^ncurses@6.2%gcc@11.1.0~symlinks+termlib abi=none arch=linux-debian9-skylake_avx512
                            ^pkgconf@1.7.4%gcc@11.1.0 arch=linux-debian9-skylake_avx512
scotch requires flex version :2.6.1,2.6.4:, but spec asked for 2.6.3
```

I also tried different versions of gmsh with the same result

### Information on your system

spack debugg report
```
* **Spack:** 0.16.2-3353-f54fad40ba
* **Python:** 3.5.3
* **Platform:** linux-debian9-skylake_avx512
* **Concretizer:** original
```
